requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel 4th Gen Dual Core 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvida GTX Series 8
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: System Sounds is the checklist
  • Additional Notes: It's a very lightweight game. If there are issues running it, then lord have mercy on your computer's soul.
